title: Great British Railway Journeys - The Ebook Collection (BBC)
description:
Books : Educational : English


Great British Railway Journeys is a travelogue documentary presented by Michael Portillo.

The first series premiered on 4 January 2010 on BBC Two, running for 20 half-hour episodes.

A further 4 series followed plus 2 series of Great Continental Railway Journeys.

In the series, Portillo travels around guided by a Victorian guidebook written by George Bradshaw, and compares how the destinations have changed between Victorian and modern times.

There are 14 ebooks to accompany this series. They are all included here plus Bradshaw's original book.


Enjoy and Seed!!
